sentences.en: A few flakes of potato stick to her lip.
sentences.cn: 她嘴唇上沾了些白薯泥.

sentences.en: A potato consists mainly of starch.
sentences.cn: 马铃薯的主要成分是淀粉.

sentences.en: Bob, you're a typical couch potato.
sentences.cn: 鲍勃, 你真是个典型的懒家伙.

sentences.en: He beat the potato into a mash before eating it.
sentences.cn: 他把马铃薯捣烂后再吃.

sentences.en: I had a steak and a baked potato.
sentences.cn: 我吃了牛排和烤马铃薯.

sentences.en: I mustn't have too much potato because I'm now on a diet.
sentences.cn: 我不能吃太多的马铃薯,因为我正在节食.

sentences.en: I went and bought about six dollars' worth of potato chips.
sentences.cn: 我去买了大约6美元的薯条。

sentences.en: Marie stood at the sink, peeling potatoes (= cutting off the skin ) .
sentences.cn: 玛丽站在洗涤槽边削土豆皮。

sentences.en: Now experts are extolling the virtues of the humble potato.
sentences.cn: 现在专家们都在赞美其貌不扬的马铃薯的种种好处。

sentences.en: Potato chips are served for the children.
The potato is a good nutrient medium for many bacteria.
sentences.cn: 马铃薯对许多细菌是一种良好的培养基.

sentences.en: The potato is a tuber plant.
The potato is vulnerable to several pests.
sentences.cn: 马铃薯易受几种害虫的侵害.

sentences.en: The racial discrimination issue is a political hot potato.
sentences.cn: 种族歧视问题是政治上的棘手问题.

sentences.en: The supervisor said that the new potato peeling machine would come tomorrow.
sentences.cn: 管理员说新的马铃薯剥皮机明天就送来了.

phrases.tran_cn: 成天躺著或坐在沙发上看电视的人；极为懒惰的人
[口]烫手山芋（喻指棘手的问题）；（英）烤土豆
马铃薯沙拉；土豆沙拉；薯仔沙律
马铃薯淀粉；生粉；太白粉（台湾叫法）
甘薯淀粉；蕃薯粉；地瓜粉

trans.tran_cn: 马铃薯， 土豆，洋芋，土豆块茎
trans.tran_en: a round white vegetable with a brown, red, or pale yellow skin, that grows under the ground
a round white vegetable with a brown, red, or pale yellow skin, that grows under the ground
